name: Rivals Duel: Card Battler
description:
Welcome to Rivals Duel, the arena where strategic depth meets thrilling card battles in a vivid warfare setting. Command your Marines and Special Operators, release devastating Bosses, and employ unique Ability Cards to outmaneuver your adversaries and assert your marine dominance.

DIVE INTO DEEP-SEA STRATEGIC WARFARE
Lead your forces to victory by assembling the ultimate battle lineup. Marines provide steadfast defense and offense, Special Operators deliver unexpected surprises, and Bosses can turn the tide of battle when deployed on the field.

EXPERIENCE RICH, DYNAMIC GAMEPLAY
Plan and strategize your moves through several compelling phases. Gain energy, draw powerful cards, and position your units strategically. Accumulated energy allows for captivating comeback victories and complex tactics.

EXPLORE EXCITING AND DIVERSE CARD TYPES
With four distinct card types - Marines, Special Operators, Bosses, and Ability Cards - each game of Rivals Duel is a unique experience. These cards offer a multitude of strategic advantages, creating dynamic game scenarios that challenge you to adapt and optimize your strategies.

A GAME ENJOYABLE FOR EVERYONE
Rivals Duel appeals to a wide range of players. Whether you're a strategy enthusiast, a war game aficionado, or a fan of competitive card games, you'll find yourself drawn into the engaging world of Rivals Duel. Regular updates and adjustments ensure a balanced and ever-evolving gameplay experience.

BATTLE IT OUT IN THE MARINE ARENA
Your battlefield is divided into a front line and back line. The survival of your Command HQ determines your success - protect it to ensure victory!
Dive into the strategic card battles of Rivals Duel, where every turn counts, and every card has the potential to change the outcome of the game. Command your forces, outwit your opponents, and conquer the battlefield!
